title: WTB various T206 Hall of Famers - low grade
author: Section103

posts.post_title: WTB various T206 Hall of Famers - low grade
posts.post_content:
Hi all.  Im looking to rebuild my Hall of Fame collection (at least a bit) and Im looking for the cards below in low grade condition.  General eye appeal is preferred, but these wont be super sharp cards.  Graded is nice, but not a requirement.  Most any back will do, but the ultra rare backs will likely be out of my budget.

All are T206s

Ty Cobb - red portrait
Walter Johnson - any version
Christy Mathewson - prefer black hat but consider any version
Cy Young - prefer green port., but consider any version

PM or email me with any options.  Thanks!
